settings.heading: Online Aphasia Café
settings.text:
The online Aphasia Café meets twice a month on Fridays – once in a morning 10.30 – 12 and once in the afternoon 1pm – 2.30pm. The group meets on Zoom.

Please contact the charity if you want to join.

settings.heading: Kirklees Aphasia Café
settings.text:
The Kirklees Aphasia Café meets twice a month on Wednesday mornings from 10.30 – 12 at Kirkheaton Community Centre, Fields Rise, Kirkheaton, HD5 0LZ

Please contact the charity if you want to join.

settings.heading: Leeds Aphasia Café
settings.text:
The Leeds Aphasia Café meets twice a month.

Once a month on Zoom on Tuesday morning 10.30 – 12. Once a month on Tuesday at Rothwell Baptist Church, 97 Wood Lane, LS26 0PG from 1pm – 3pm.

Please contact the charity if you want to join.

settings.heading: Harrogate Aphasia Café
settings.text:
The Harrogate Aphasia Café meets twice a month on Thursday mornings from 10.30 – 12 at Knaresborough Road Health Centre, Knaresborough Road, Harrogate, HG2 7LU

Please contact the charity if you want to join.

settings.heading: Wakefield Aphasia Café
settings.text:
The Wakefield Aphasia Café meets twice a month on Friday mornings from 10.30 – 12 at West Wakefield Methodist Church, Thornes Road, Wakefield, WF2 8QR.

Please contact the charity if you want to join.

settings.heading: Barnsley Aphasia Café
settings.text:
The Barnsley Aphasia Café meets twice a month on Friday mornings at Barnsley Metrodome, Queens Road, Barnsley, S71 1AN.

The group meets from 10.30am – 12.

Please contact the charity of you want to join.

settings.heading: Calderdale Aphasia Café
settings.text:
The Calderdale Aphasia Café meets twice a month on Friday mornings at Holy Trinity & St Jude’s Church, Free School Lane, Halifax, HX1 2XE.

The group meets from 10.30 – 12.30.

Please contact the charity if you want to join.

settings.heading: Doncaster Aphasia Café
settings.text:
The Doncaster Aphasia Café meets twice a month on Thursday mornings at Holiday Inn A1 (M), High Road, Warmsworth, Doncaster, DN4 9UX

The group meets from 10.30am – 12.

Please contact the charity if you would like to join.

If you are interested in attending one of our Aphasia Café's please get in touch.

Click here to read our FAQ’s and learn more about what to expect from our Aphasia Café group sessions.

To speak to a member of our team, call 01924 562443 or email info@aphasiasupport.org.
